mapper.sql: id, spec_asset_id, plan_type, start_time, end_time, remark, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by
mapper.select: SELECT t.*, t1.name, t1.asset_code, t1.status, t1.line_id, t2.line_name, t1.workshop_id, t3.name as workshopName, t1.manuf_no, t1.leave_factory, t1.use_date, t1.group_id, t4.depart_name as groupName, t1.duty_user_id, t5.realname as dutyUserName FROM bu_spec_asset_plan t LEFT JOIN bu_spec_assets t1 ON t1.id = t.spec_asset_id left join bu_mtr_line t2 on t2.line_id = t1.line_id left join bu_mtr_workshop t3 on t3.id = t1.workshop_id left join sys_depart t4 on t4.id = t1.group_id left join sys_user t5 on t5.id = t1.duty_user_id where t.id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM bu_spec_asset_plan WHERE spec_asset_id = #{specAssetId}
AND ( (start_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}) OR (end_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}) )
